name: Escape Prison 2 framed 4murder
description:
Escape the prison 2 the free adventure game is back with the second chapter.

Sam is a journalist, he was investigating a corruption case. One day he comes home and finds his girlfriend lying on the floor, she was killed. The judge does not believe his words and condemns him to life imprisonment. Sam is sure that someone wanted to set him up, now he has to find a way to escape and prove his innocence!

You are now in a new prison, all controlled by computer systems, try to find tools and objects all around and use them to solve puzzles, try to Escape!
